sentences.english: But the true mingled with the false mahjong, this time to do five door is also acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 但麻将虚虚实实，这个时候坚持做五门也未尝不可。

sentences.english: The game is to fictions, this was fun.
sentences.chinese: 游戏就是要虚虚实实，这样才开心。
